Data: Faulkner to Samuels, no run floats a length ball across the batsman, who dabs it behind the wicket
Faulkner to Samuels, FOUR runs width on offer and he's crunched that off the backfoot into the point boundary. Delightful timing, got on top of the bounce and boom!
Faulkner to Samuels, no run much fuller and across Samuels, who watches it through to the keeper. That was the leg-cutter as well
Faulkner to Samuels, no run beautiful delivery again, gets it to land just around the region where Samuels isn't sure whether to play forward or go back, left alone in the end
Faulkner to Samuels, no run forces that off the backfoot to cover point
Faulkner to Samuels, no run another slower delivery outside off, Samuels leaves and Wade has a tough task taking it on the second bounce. Slowness of the surface coming through already
Hazlewood to Ramdin, no run good length ball on off stump, solidly defended
Hazlewood to Ramdin, no run slower one on off stump, Ramdin inside-edges a drive to Boland at mid-on
Hazlewood to Ramdin, no run invites Ramdin to blast one through cover, there's a hint of movement away from off stump, left alone
Hazlewood to Ramdin, no run fantastic delivery again, draws him forward by floating it full on off stump, enough movement to create a doubt in the batsman's mind, watched through to the keeper
Hazlewood to Ramdin, no run gets behind the line of the ball to bunt that to the off side
Hazlewood to Ramdin, no run getting too predictable, and that's his USP, isn't it? Another full ball on off stump that's left alone by Ramdin
Faulkner to Samuels, no run length ball on middle, Samuels gets back to punch that to cover

Faulkner to Samuels, FOUR runs the heaven or hell approach from Samuels, no half-measures as he looks to clobber that over cover, but ends up getting a thick inside edge that races past Hazlewood at midwicket. Has enough legs to race into the boundary
Faulkner to Samuels, no run lazy elegance to the fore, gets half-forward to ease that to cover
Faulkner to Samuels, 1 run enough width for him to make some room and crunch that off the frontfoot to sweeper cover
Faulkner to Ramdin, no run looks to get across but ends up staying put on middle stump as he plays it back down the pitch

Faulkner to Ramdin, FOUR runs top shot! Shows the full face of the bat to ease that half-volley past mid-on. Short boundary there, and on this billiards top, there was no chance for the fielder to dish in a dive. Exquisite timing
Hazlewood to Samuels, no run full ball on off stump, steered to gully
Hazlewood to Samuels, no run angles a length ball into middle and leg, tucked to midwicket
Hazlewood to Samuels, no run shapes to pull but was through with the stroke when the ball rolled off the toe-end to mid-on. Clearly early into the stroke there, but it was there to be hit
Hazlewood to Samuels, no run uppish, but safe. Looks to hit it down the ground over the bowler's head, but the ball stops on him a touch to lob off the top half of the bat. Lands short of mid-on
Hazlewood to Samuels, no run crunching sound of the ball hitting the centre, but Bailey is upto the task at point as he stops what would have been a certain boundary otherwise
Hazlewood to Samuels, no run slow and full on middle, dabbed to the off side
Faulkner to Ramdin, no run fuller in length, on middle, played back with a straight bat

Faulkner to Ramdin, 1 run nudged off the pad to fine leg. Hazlewood fires a throw to the keeper, who inturn has a shy at the stumps at the bowler's end even as Ramdin desperately tries to hustle back after being refused the second by Marlon
Faulkner to Samuels, 1 run tucks the length ball on middle and leg to fine leg
Faulkner to Ramdin, no run defended with soft hands to midwicket, wicket-to-wicket stuff from Faulkner
Faulkner to Ramdin, no run punched to short cover, Bailey the man there. Once again the ball stops on him a touch as he looks to force that through the gap
Faulkner to Ramdin, no run cuts, but straight to Maxwell at point
Boland to Samuels, no run starts with a short one that holds onto the surface to prevent Samuels from going for a full-blooded cut shot, the ball rolls to mid-off as the bat face turns in his hand
Boland to Samuels, no run play and a miss. This one holds its line after pitching at length on off stump, Samuels is squared up as the ball misses the bails by a whisker
Boland to Samuels, no run floats one back in from wide of the crease, Samuels is hit high on the pad as he misses the across-the-line whip

Boland to Samuels, no run appeal for caught behind, but umpire Gregory Brathwaite is unmoved. Samuels' feet are glued to the crease as he attempts to punch off the backfoot. Has a go at it but looks like it missed everything. Matthew Wade's reaction was a giveaway of sorts. He wasn't convinced the
Boland to Samuels, 1 run the attempted run down to third man is intercepted by the point fielder
Boland to Ramdin, 2 runs whipped off his hip past square leg, aggressive calling made the second possible
Faulkner to Samuels, no run full-length delivery angling across, Samuels opens the bat face to ease it to the slip fielder
Faulkner to Samuels, 1 run on the pads, worked with the angle to long-on
Faulkner to Ramdin, no run stays inside the crease and punches that back to the bowler
Faulkner to Ramdin, no run length ball slanted across the batsman, pushed to cover, tight bowling this
Faulkner to Ramdin, 1 run width on offer, crunched to sweeper cover
Faulkner to Samuels, 1 run gets across and works it wide of midwicket for an easy single
Boland to Samuels, no run how does he do this like a machine? Lands it a touch ahead of good length on off stump, defended back down the pitch
Boland to Samuels, no run gets forward and defends again
Boland to Samuels, no run banged in short, but slides it down leg, Samuels ducks under it
Boland to Samuels, 1 run half-volley on the pads, flicked to deep midwicket
Boland to Ramdin, 1 run hustles Ramdin for pace as he goes back into the crease to work that wide of midwicket
Boland to Samuels, no run back of length delivery on middle from wide of the crease, he hops back to angle it to point
Marsh to Ramdin, no run starts off with a short ball outside off, pushed to cover
Marsh to Ramdin, 1 run width on offer, cuts it to deep point to bring up >b> 2000 ODI runs
Marsh to Samuels, 1 run top shot, some punch in that stroke as he uses the bottom hand to essay that short ball to deep point
Marsh to Ramdin, no run beaten by one that nips away late. Ramdin pokes at that one with minimal feet movement, was helped by the late movement
Marsh to Ramdin, no run gets one to swing back in from off stump, defended back with a straight bat
Marsh to Ramdin, no run stays inside the crease to dab the length ball to cover
Boland to Samuels, 1 run turns it to the vacant midwicket region for an easy single
Boland to Ramdin, 1 run flicked off the pads past mid-on, where Mitch Marsh dishes in the slide to keep it down to a single
Boland to Samuels, 1 wide wonder if they're trying to trap him down leg. This one's floated into the pads, all Samuels needed to do was get a faint tickle to get a boundary, misses
Boland to Samuels, no run opens the bat face to play that one to point
Boland to Samuels, FOUR runs that's a fabulous shot! Picks the length early, moves leg side to open up the off side and then hammers that into the point boundary. There was a touch of arrogance there
Boland to Samuels, no run nearly chopped it back onto the stumps. Feet glued to the crease as he looks to ease it to the off side, the ball bounces off the inside edge over the stumps
Boland to Samuels, 1 run once again he gets on top of the bounce to crunch that to deep point
Marsh to Samuels, 2 runs fractionally short on off, Samuels swivels on the back foot and flat-bats a pull towards midwicket. Starc dishes out a drive and creates an indentation on the ground
Marsh to Samuels, no run Marsh throws his head back in despair. Back of a length and kicks up outside off. Samuels throws his hands at a cut and is defeated by the lift
Marsh to Samuels, 1 run much fuller on off, Samuels guides it behind square on the off side for one
Marsh to Ramdin, no run back of a length and outside off, punched out to point
Marsh to Ramdin, no run length ball on off, pushed to mid-off on the front foot
Marsh to Ramdin, no run back of a length on off, the late away movement defeats Ramdin. He hung his bat out and got beaten past the outside edge. Marsh throws his head back, again. Probing bowling
Boland to Samuels, SIX runs Samuels clears his front leg and launches it straight over the bowler's head. Bang! Length ball on middle, Samuels sends it clattering straight down the ground

Boland to Samuels, FOUR runs West Indies find some momentum! Fuller on off, Samuels slices a drive through the covers, beats mid-off as well. Faulkner chases and slides in vain, by the edge of the boundary
Boland to Samuels, 1 run back of a length and outside off, slapped away to deep point
Boland to Ramdin, no run shorter and outside off, Ramdin gets on top of the bounce and punches it to short extra cover
Boland to Ramdin, 2 runs dug in short and outside off, Ramdin fetches it from there and pulls towards square leg, where the fielder dives over the ball and leaks runs
Boland to Ramdin, no run back of a length, targetting the top of off, punchily blocked back to the bowler
Marsh to Samuels, no run rising short ball on off, Samuels rises with it and drops it in front of his toes
Marsh to Samuels, FOUR runs Marsh goes too full on off, Samuels responds with a drilled drive, hits through the line, past the bowler for four
Marsh to Samuels, FOUR runs this is even better! Short and width outside off, Samuels leans back and cuts it firmly past Maxi at backward point for another boundary
Marsh to Samuels, no run Marsh pulls his length back and cramps Samuels for room, flat-batted towards mid-on

Marsh to Samuels, FOUR runs this is a peach, although Samuels was helped by the errant length. Overpitched and outside off, his feet do not move. But the hands give him the power. Driven through the covers

Marsh to Samuels, FOUR runs Samuels brings up his second successive half-century against Australia, with a poked four. Looks like a cutter on the leg stump, he aims a flick and sends a leading edge to third man
Boland to Ramdin, 3 runs full and straight, Ramdin picks it away to the right of mid-on. Flicked for three
Boland to Samuels, 1 run fraction short and wide outside off, Samuels gets his front leg out of the way and smears a cut to deep point
Boland to Ramdin, no run back of a length and outside off, jabbed to point
Boland to Ramdin, no run back of a length on off, forward and punched straight to mid-off
Boland to Ramdin, no run length and angled in, worked to midwicket
Boland to Ramdin, 2 runs back of a length and angled in, tucked through backward square leg for one
Marsh to Samuels, 1 wide Marsh tests Samuels with a bouncer outside off, he sways out of the way. Too high and wided
Marsh to Samuels, FOUR runs Samuels powers on. Dug in short on off, Marsh does not have much pace. 131ks, Samuels waits on the back foot for the pull. Hit over mid-on
Marsh to Samuels, 1 run short again on middle, cross seamer, Samuels stands outside leg and flaps a pull over Bailey at short midwicket
Marsh to Ramdin, 1 run back of a length and outside off, Ramdin rises on top of the bounce and punches a single to the off-side sweeper
Marsh to Samuels, no run back of a length inducker, tucks up Samuels for room. Jammed out towards short midwicket
Marsh to Samuels, 1 run short and wide outside off, cut with a flamboyant flourish to sweeper cover
Marsh to Ramdin, 1 run full and aimed at off, Ramdin camps back and clips a single wide of midwicket
Finch to Ramdin, no run skids on a back of a length and outside off, pushed to short extra cover
Finch to Ramdin, 1 run overpitched and outside off, driven to short extra cover
Finch to Samuels, no run full on middle, no turn, blocked back to Finch
Finch to Samuels, no run slider on middle, clipped to short midwicket
Finch to Samuels, 1 run drifts in and turns a bit, pushed to short extra cover for a speedy single
Finch to Ramdin, 1 run full and straight, whipped through midwicket
Starc to Ramdin, no run Starc goes wide of the crease and skates this in from round the stumps. Ping! Hit on the pad
Starc to Ramdin, SIX runs Finch signals six near the backward square leg boundary! Full and sliding into the pads, Ramdin picks it up with the wrists and dispatches it for a flat six
Starc to Ramdin, 1 run too full and veers in on off, whipped to deep midwicket
Starc to Samuels, no run full and angled in, 147ks, Samuels pushes out with his hands and jabs to mid-off
Starc to Samuels, no run yorker, homing in on middle, dug out
Starc to Samuels, 1 run full and holds its line outside off, Samuels is left reaching for the ball. Sliced drive to third man ensues
Finch to Samuels, no run flat and fired outside leg as Samuels backs away. Squeezed out
Finch to Samuels, no run slider outside off, cuts and misses
Finch to Samuels, no run full and turns away outside off, left alone
Finch to Samuels, 1 run shorter and outside off, cut on the back foot through point
Finch to Ramdin, 1 run lobbed up full on middle, non-turning ball, driven inside-out to long-off
Finch to Samuels, 1 run slid through on off, driven through the covers
Starc to Samuels, no run short and angled in on middle, 145ks, defended back
Starc to Samuels, 1 run short, veers in and cramps the batsman for room. Fended towards square leg. The two batsmen get together and punch gloves, first 100 partnership for WI this series
Starc to Ramdin, 1 run full incoming ball, Ramdin drives and squirts an inside edge behind square
Starc to Samuels, no run full, full enough for the drive. Samuels plays uppishly to short extra cover

Starc to Samuels, 1 run Wade dives to his right and shells it Starc nearly had the breakthrough with the cutter. Full and swerves away outside off from round the wicket, Samuels has a leaden-footed push and edges it. Wade drops it as the ball rolls between keeper and slip
Starc to Ramdin, no run 149ks leaping ball, pings the glove and rolls to square
Finch to Samuels, no run dabbed to the leg side
Finch to Samuels, FOUR runs Samuels marches down the track, manufactures a full ball, and drives down the ground to reach 5000 ODI runs
Finch to Samuels, 1 run Samuels steps out and gets a full toss, bunted to long-on
Finch to Ramdin, FOUR runs length ball on the off stump, Ramdin targets it and swipes it over vacant midwicket
Finch to Ramdin, 1 run short and spins away wide outside off, flat-batted away to wide long-off
Finch to Samuels, no run cramps Samuels for room. Quicker one at 88ks, Chopped from off stump to point
Faulkner to Ramdin, 1 run dear me! Nearly. Looks to flick, and gets a leading edge that lobs over Smith's outstretched hands at cover
Faulkner to Samuels, no run incoming delivery from wide of the crease, left alone

Faulkner to Samuels, FOUR runs width and belted. Picks the gap between point and short third man. He took the pace off the ball, but it didn't matter. Faulkner knew it was a bad ball the moment he delivered it
Faulkner to Samuels, no run stays inside the crease and dabs that to point
Faulkner to Samuels, 1 run worked with the angle to long-on, easy single taken
Faulkner to Ramdin, no run gets a thick inside edge to square leg, Faulkner mutters a few words to the batsman.
Maxwell to Samuels, no run
Maxwell to Samuels, no run turns it with the spin to midwicket
Maxwell to Samuels, 1 run makes a bit of room and cuts to deep point
Maxwell to Ramdin, 1 run pushed through quicker on middle and leg, nudged to short fine leg
Maxwell to Samuels, 1 wide fires one down leg, Wade does well to get across to half-stop that
Maxwell to Samuels, no run short, gets away with that as Samuels mistimes the cut to cover
Maxwell to Samuels, 1 run worked with the spin to midwicket, Samuels will keep strike
Faulkner to Samuels, no run dead bats an incoming delivery from wide of the crease
Faulkner to Samuels, 1 run drops it into the off side for a quick single
Faulkner to Ramdin, 1 run
Faulkner to Samuels, no run defended off the backfoot to the off side
Faulkner to Samuels, 1 run on the pads, worked into the square leg region
Faulkner to Ramdin, no run full ball on off stump, stabbed to the man coming in from point
Maxwell to Samuels, 1 run worked with the spin to deep midwicket
Maxwell to Ramdin, 2 runs too short, he makes a bit of room and cuts that into the gap at deep cover
Maxwell to Ramdin, 1 wide bowls a slider down leg, good take by Wade
Maxwell to Ramdin, 1 run too short again, crunched to deep point this time
Maxwell to Samuels, no run poor ball and is lucky to get away. Too short, Samuels cuts it straight to point
Maxwell to Samuels, 1 run worked with the spin to short fine leg for a quick single
Maxwell to Ramdin, no run on the shorter side, whipped to midwicket
Faulkner to Samuels, no run defended with a dead bat, the inside edge rolls off the pad to the off side
Faulkner to Samuels, no run steered to Bailey at point, wants the single but quickly changes his mind
Faulkner to Samuels, no run whipped to midwicket, Ramdin was backing up a long way but no damage done in the end
Faulkner to Samuels, no run defends the incoming full delivery to short midwicket
Faulkner to Samuels, 1 run length ball on middle and leg, turned wide of square leg
Faulkner to Ramdin, 1 run floats it full on middle and leg, eased down to long-on
Boland to Ramdin, 2 runs
Boland to Ramdin, 1 run tapped wide of point to bring up his eighth ODI fifty. He soaks in the applause of the dressing room, top knock
Boland to Samuels, 1 run flat-batted pull to deep square leg
Boland to Ramdin, 1 run gets inside the line of the ball and helps the short ball down to fine leg
Boland to Samuels, 1 wide poor direction, too short and well outside the wide line, Samuels looks to play an upper cut but couldn't reach that one
Boland to Samuels, 1 run looks for a single, and will get it. All he did was simply tap that gently to the off side to set off for the run. Ramdin was off the blocks spontaneously
Boland to Ramdin, 1 run uses the pace of the bowler to angle it wide of a diving Maxwell at point

Faulkner to Ramdin, FOUR runs just over short fine leg. Loaded with risk, but it was too poor a delivery, which he somehow took toll of. Length ball angling down leg, and he's simply used the pace to pick him over the fielder there
Faulkner to Ramdin, no run gets a thick edge while attempting a drive, lands short of short third ma
Faulkner to Ramdin, 1 run driven down the ground to long-off
Faulkner to Samuels, 1 run dabbed to point, they complete the run in a jiffy
Faulkner to Ramdin, 1 run gets a thick inside edge past the bowler, to long-on
Faulkner to Samuels, 1 run incoming length delivery, dropped wide of the bowler on the leg side for a quick single
Boland to Samuels, 1 run length ball on off stump, tapped gently to point for a quick single
Boland to Ramdin, 1 run cut away, but will find the sweeper at deep point
Boland to Samuels, no run gets on top of the bounce and bunts it to point
Boland to Samuels, no run not much room to work with again, point comes into play again to stop that dab
Boland to Samuels, 1 run uses the pace to run the incoming length ball down to third man

Boland to Ramdin, no run shapes to play a flat-batted pull, but it was an excellent short ball that was angling into middle from wide of the crease. Ramdin was hurried for pace as well and in the end he simply swayed out of the way
Marsh to Samuels, 1 run hops across to work it off his hi
Marsh to Ramdin, FOUR runs picks the length early and uses his wrists to work it behind square on the leg side, fine leg had no chance there. Super placement, bisected the gap perfectly
Marsh to Ramdin, 1 run pulled in front of square to deep midwicket
Marsh to Samuels, no run slower one on middle, turned to midwicket
Marsh to Samuels, no run full length delivery on off stump, there's an invitation to drive, but Samuels lets that go
Marsh to Samuels, no run accurate stuff, not much room, the full ball is bunted back to the bowler
Boland to Ramdin, 2 runs toe-ends a mow to deep midwicket, where Khawaja does the mopping up
Boland to Ramdin, FOUR runs wonderful stroke. Genuine gift, and he takes full toll, Too short, he makes room and slaps that in front of square, one bounce into the cover boundary.
Boland to Ramdin, 2 runs picks the bones out of that pull, but can't pick the gap, Khawaja in action again at deep midwicket
Boland to Ramdin, 1 run swung across the line, gets a thick inside edge down to deep fine leg, looks like he's decided enough is enough
Boland to Samuels, no run excellent bouncer, Samuels was waiting for it yes, but couldn't have played the pull with the ball being delivered at close to 140 clicks
Boland to Samuels, 1 run once again the pace of the ball means the ball rushes onto him as he shapes to play the pull, which lobs to mid-off
Starc to Samuels, no run angles a yorker-length delivery back in from round the stumps, Samuels is beaten on the drive as the ball rolls to the keeper
Starc to Samuels, 1 run leans forward and eases the drive to deep cover, 200 up for West Indies. Applause around the ground

Starc to Ramdin, SIX runs he's clobbered that! Clears his front leg and slaps that over long-on. Disdainfully done. This was too full, he made a bit of room and swung through the line to make clean connection

Starc to Ramdin, SIX runs and another one! This is even better. Some savage hitting this. Starc angles it full, it was right in the slot for Ramdin, who simply lofted through the line. The ball nearly hit those expensive ultra-motion camera near the sightscreen
Starc to Ramdin, 1 run uses the pace of the bowler to run it down to third man this time
Starc to Samuels, 1 run driven down to long-off
Hazlewood to Samuels, 1 run loopy cutter outside off, run down to third man
Hazlewood to Ramdin, no run Hazlewood rolls his fingers across this full one outside off and beats the drive
Hazlewood to Ramdin, 2 runs full and arrowed through on middle, Ramdin walks across off and clips it to fine leg. They hare across for the second. Well done!
Hazlewood to Ramdin, 1 run too straight again, glanced to fine leg again
Hazlewood to Samuels, 1 run tennis ball bounce on this short ball on off, Samuels guides a pull towards fine leg
Hazlewood to Ramdin, 1 run near yorker on middle, whipped to midwicket
Starc to Ramdin, 1 wide wild full ball down the leg side from round the stumps, wide
Starc to Ramdin, 1 run yorker, skates in on off, dug out towards point for one
Starc to Samuels, no run Starc sends down a crackin ball, a lifter, something that defined his first spell. 147ks, this. Samuels hops and skips. Loosens his grip and fends it towards point
Starc to Samuels, 1 run low full toss on off, guided towards deep point

Starc to Ramdin, OUT Back of a length and veers in, Ramdin aims for a roundhouse swipe across the line and does not connect. Timbaah! Ramdin acknowledges a cheers as he walks back. Starc finally finds a way past this pair. The quick hit the top of middle
Starc to Pollard, 1 run banged in short and angled in, pings the glove and runs towards square leg
Starc to Samuels, no run yorker just outside off, 146ks, can't be squeezed out
Hazlewood to Pollard, no run dug in short and gets big on KP, he cushions it into the pitch
Hazlewood to Pollard, FOUR runs lifting ball outside off, Pollard was late to hook, sends a top edge over Wade
Hazlewood to Pollard, 1 run follows it with another nasty bouncer, this is directed just outside off. KP fends it towards third man
Hazlewood to Samuels, 1 run yorker, homing in, squirted behind square off an inside edge
Hazlewood to Pollard, 1 run short and homing in on the ribs, worked gently to square leg for one
Hazlewood to Samuels, 1 run full and straight, bunted down the ground
Boland to Pollard, no run 113ks slower bouncer, foxes KP
Boland to Pollard, no run slower short ball outside off, Pollard swings early and misses

Boland to Pollard, OUT The short ball pins down Pollard. Leaping ball outside off, quicker one from Boland. Pollard, looking to pull, drags it from outside off. Marsh runs to his right and takes it comfortably at deep midwicket
Boland to Samuels, 2 runs yorker outside off, driven through the covers
Boland to Samuels, 1 wide bouncer outside off, left alone, too high. Wide
Boland to Samuels, 1 run too full and outside off, flayed to long-off
Boland to Brathwaite, no run full and outside off, run down to short third man
Faulkner to Samuels, FOUR runs back of the hand legcutter outside off, the batsman waits on it and forces it past backward point for four
Faulkner to Samuels, 1 run yorker at the toes, jabbed down to long-on
Faulkner to Brathwaite, no run short and angled in, open-faced dab to backward point. Third man is up as well
Faulkner to Brathwaite, 1 run length ball on off, Carlos clears his front leg for a swipe. Ends up slicing over extra cover
Faulkner to Samuels, FOUR runs back of the hand legcutter, Samuels cuts it away for four again. Placed it between backward point and third man
Faulkner to Samuels, 1 run legcutter too full, jammed out to the covers

Starc to Samuels, 1 run full and angled in on middle from round the stumps, tucked to the midwicket region. A direct hit from Bailey could have dismissed Pollard at the keeper's end. Sloppy running from the big man
Starc to Pollard, no run full toss on middle, pushed to mid-off

Starc to Pollard, no run Starc hammers a short ball and cramps Pollard for room. Pollard was taking evasive action. Off the forearm to the keeper. The batsmen cross over. And it has been called a dead ball
Starc to Pollard, no run yorker outside off, can't be jammed out. Beaten.
Starc to Pollard, 2 runs short and angled in, helped to long leg
Starc to Pollard, 1 run too full and outside off, eased to short extra cover for one
Hazlewood to Pollard, 2 runs back of a length and attacking the body, guided to fine leg
Hazlewood to Pollard, no run Pollard nearly swung himself off his feet! Full and outside off, having backed away, Pollard flays and misses
Hazlewood to Pollard, 1 run short ball on off, flapped away to fine leg

Hazlewood to Samuels, 1 run there it is! There is Samue's moment. He has played 16 years against Australia, and this is his first century against them. The crowd bursts into cheers. This has been some knock. He kisses the helmet and gets a hug from KP. Full and straight, he goes deep in the crease

Hazlewood to Pollard, SIX runs caught at the edge of the boundary Maxwell signals a six. Back of a length and angled in, Pollard clouts it in the air. Shovelled it, in fact. Maxwell pouched it, but lost momentum as his left foot touched the rope at the deep midwicket boundary
Hazlewood to Pollard, 1 run back of a length on middle, clipped to the leg side
Boland to Samuels, 1 run yorker on off, backs away and squeezes to the covers
Boland to Brathwaite, 2 runs dug in short and outside off, Carlos winds up and swats to wide long-on
Boland to Brathwaite, FOUR runs Boland aims for the yorker, goes too full on off, Carlos clears his front leg and smears it to the right of mid-off. Smacked to the boundary
Boland to Brathwaite, OUT great reply from Boland. Pinpoint yorker on off, dips under the bat and tilts the middle stump back. Some more reward for Boland at the death
Boland to Holder, 1 run slower bouncer on off, 116.4ks, fended to the leg side for one
Boland to Samuels, FOUR runs Boland misses the yorker and serves it up too full on middle, Samuels jumps outside leg and blasts a straight down. Bombs away!
Faulkner to Holder, OUT Holder holes out! Looks like the back of the hand legcutter. Full and outside off. Holder attacks it and ends up slicing it straight into the lap of sweeper cover
Faulkner to Samuels, 1 run short on middle, heaved to Finch at long-on
Faulkner to Narine, no run back of the hand slower one outside off, Narine swings early and does not touch it
Faulkner to Narine, 1 run back of a length and outside off, whipped to long-on

Faulkner to Samuels, SIX runs Samuels clears Maxwell and gets six! He stepped outside leg and was chased by a back of a length ball. Clouted over midwicket. Maxi aimed to leap in the air, take it, and flick the ball back into play by the edge of the boundary. No dice. No balance. Six
Faulkner to Samuels, OUT No, he is dismissed off the last ball of WI's innings. What a reception for him! Full and outside off, Samuels swings and ends up slicing a catch to sweeper cover
"No West Indian batsman has scored more ODI runs in the last 3 years than Marlon Samuels. He deserves some credit."
Marlon Samuels Last 2 years (M) 23 (R)1085 (HS)133* (AVG) 57.13"
4.50pm Samuels and Ramdin gun West Indies to 282 from 31 for 3. Australia need 283 to stay alive. Can Woakes seal a thriller for England? 14 required off six . We'll be back soon for the chase.

5.15pm Welcome back. Plunkett just hit a last-ball six to force a tie for England against Sri Lanka in Nottingham. Will we have a thriller here at Bridgetown? Australia, remember, go home if they lose this. Everything to play for. Aaron Finch and Usman Khawaj are the two openers. Shadows are starting to
Holder to Khawaja, 1 run Brathwaite dives to his right at mid-off to keep that full-blooded off drive to a single
Holder to Finch, FOUR runs crashed into the cover boundary. Overpitched and he put that away easily. Foot forward before he powered that between cover and mid-off
Holder to Finch, 1 leg bye slides one into middle and leg, the ball deflects of the thigh pad as he looks to work it past square leg
Holder to Khawaja, 2 runs too straight again, clipped away off the pads to deep fine leg, easy pickings those
Holder to Khawaja, 1 run hits the deck hard, angles a length ball across Khawaja, who bunts it to mid-off for a quick single
Holder to Finch, 2 runs whipped off his hip towards deep backward square leg. Runs of every delivery in this over
Gabriel to Khawaja, 2 runs picked away off his pads. Poor start, too full and he eases that towards deep square leg
Gabriel to Khawaja, no run much better. Not much room to work that length ball angling away, tapped back down the pitch
Gabriel to Khawaja, 2 runs too short on leg stump, worked off his hip to deep square

Gabriel to Khawaja, FOUR runs this one's a juicy half-volley on the pads, Khawaja will put those away even in his sleep. Balance, timing and placement perfect as he picks that one away into the midwicket boundary. Excellent wrist work
Gabriel to Khawaja, no run hops back to turn the short ball on middle to midwicket
Gabriel to Khawaja, no run flicked, but straight to mid-on this time
Holder to Finch, FOUR runs plays the upper cut with ease. Sitting up nicely for him to free his arms and throw the kitchen sink at that, Finch does just that. One bounce into the ropes at deep point
Holder to Finch, FOUR runs pulled in front of square, imperious! Picks the length early and fetches the pull from outside off. Struck that cleanly, nearly went all the way!
Holder to Finch, 1 run nips back in from outside off, he pushes outside the line to get a thick inside edge to square leg
Holder to Khawaja, 1 run looks to flick, gets a leading edge that rolls to mid-off as they complete the run. Closed the bat face early there
Holder to Finch, no run driven on the up, straight to mid-off. Better length that, Finch was briefly in two minds
Holder to Finch, no run beaten by a jaffa! Finch is squared up as he shapes to defend the length ball that nips away ever-so-late. Top stuff
Gabriel to Khawaja, no run lands a half-volley on the pads, flicked to mid-on again
Gabriel to Khawaja, 2 runs clipped towards Carter at deep midwicket, at the moment, he's operating on just one side of the wicket here
Gabriel to Khawaja, 1 run feeds him with a half-volley on the pads again, this time Khawaja works it much square to the boundary rider
Gabriel to Finch, 1 leg bye slides into middle and leg, looks to nudge it leg side, the ball deflects off the pad to short fine as they scamper through for a run
Gabriel to Khawaja, no run ball hurries onto the bat as Khawaja mistimes an attempted off drive to mid-off
Gabriel to Khawaja, no run much better, floats it at length on middle, Khawaja is a touch squared up as he pats it back to the bowler
Brathwaite to Finch, 1 run immediately gets some lift off the deck as Finch hops back to run that down to third man
Brathwaite to Khawaja, 1 run angling into the pads, clipped to deep square leg

Brathwaite to Finch, OUT uppish and there's the first wicket. Finch is clearly hustled for pace as he hops back to whip it to square leg. He had to fetch the ball from outside off as the extra bounce means the ball lobs off the leading edge to mid-on. Brathwaite is pumped as he leaps in joy to cele
Brathwaite to Smith, no run solidly behind the line as he bunts it back to the bowler
Brathwaite to Smith, no run gets across the stumps to pat that incoming length ball back to the bowler
Brathwaite to Smith, no run slower and fuller on off stump, squeezed to point. Excellent first over

Gabriel to Khawaja, OUT first ODI wicket for Gabriel, and it's a peach to get Khawaja. Angles a length ball across after all those deliveries on the pads, and is rewarded immediately. This was bowled at an angle where Khawaja simply had to play, and he made the mistake of playing with an angled bat
Gabriel to Bailey, no run keeps out that full delivery on middle using a straight bat
Gabriel to Bailey, no run straightens off length on middle, Bailey hops back and defends
Gabriel to Bailey, FOUR runs bread and butter stroke. Can't ask for a better delivery first up, can you? On the pads, and he works it wide of mid-on. Pressure released with that buffet ball
Gabriel to Bailey, no run pushed off the backfoot to cover point
Gabriel to Bailey, FOUR runs the edge flies into the third man boundary. Lucky, but it doesn't matter for Australia. Looks to slash, went hard at it and got the result he desired in the end
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run punched to cover point, top work by Charles but couldn't prevent the run. He moved swiftly to his left
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run gets back and across as he punches the length ball on off stump to cover
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run punched again, straight to cover
Brathwaite to Bailey, 1 run squared up as the edge flies to third man
Brathwaite to Smith, no run pulled, but can't pick the gap. He fetched it from outside off alright, but hit it straight to midwicket
Brathwaite to Smith, no run shows the full face of the bat to tap it back down the pitch

Gabriel to Bailey, no run beaten by a peach! That one was bowled at 148.5 clicks. Bailey was clearly late to get down on that length ball that deviated just a touch after pitching on off stump. That wasn't far away from the nick
Gabriel to Bailey, no run lets that go. The ball nips back in sharply from outside off
Gabriel to Bailey, no run the ball thuds into the pad as Bailey is half-forward while defending
Gabriel to Bailey, no run in the slot to drive, hit straight to mid-off
Gabriel to Bailey, no run not quite there for the cut, he went through despite being cramped for room, chopped to cover point
Gabriel to Bailey, no run angles it full on middle from wide of the crease, pushed to cover. Maiden over
Brathwaite to Smith, no run opens the bat face late to bunt the length ball to point, refuses the single immediately
Brathwaite to Smith, no run kept low and he nearly dragged it back onto the stumps. The ball rolls to the keeper off the bottom of the bat
Brathwaite to Smith, 2 runs misfield at cover gives away two runs. It was a firm push, and Benn made a mess of that by dishing in an awkward dive. He slipped as he went down
Brathwaite to Smith, FOUR runs imperious pull! Picks the length early, rolls his wrists to keep the ball down and picks the gap at square leg. Easy pickings

Brathwaite to Smith, FOUR runs crunching cover drive. The followthrough of the bat as he made the connection was copy book style. In the slot and he climbed onto that in a jiffy. Got a touch across to make the contact. Stillness as he made contact was the key. Outstanding
Brathwaite to Smith, no run gets half-forward as he defends to cover
Gabriel to Bailey, FOUR runs that's the shot of the evening. Too short, and Bailey forces that off the backfoot into the point boundary. Got on top of the bounce to play that
Gabriel to Bailey, no run drives, but takes the bottom hand off the grip as he makes contact. Ball stopped on him
Gabriel to Bailey, no run hops back to defend a full-length delivery to Pollard at point
Gabriel to Bailey, 1 run once again on the shorter side, forced to Fletcher at extra cover
Gabriel to Smith, no run shuffles across to defend a length ball back down the pitch
Gabriel to Smith, no run gets a thick inside edge onto the pad as he looks to drive through cover
Benn to Bailey, FOUR runs and Bailey welcomes us with a cut four. Dropped short and outside off, Bailey skips back and slaps it past covers
Benn to Bailey, 2 runs short and outside off, cracks a cut through backward point
Benn to Bailey, no run short again, this one turns past the outside edge
Benn to Bailey, FOUR runs darts another short ball and gives width, Bailey rocks back and cracks another cut through backward point. No chance for Carlos, chasing from sweeper cover, and then sliding
Benn to Bailey, no run Benn held this back and finds sharp turn outside off, glided to short third man
Benn to Bailey, no run lobbed up full on off, Bailey bends forward in defence
Narine to Smith, no run full and skids on middle, flicked to backward square leg
Narine to Smith, 1 run flighted full on off, tapped to long-on
Narine to Bailey, 1 run pushed through shorter on off, punched down to long-on
Narine to Smith, 1 run full and straight, Smith whips it sweetly through midwicket
Narine to Bailey, no run tucked off the thigh pad to backward square leg
Narine to Bailey, 2 runs another one tucked off the hips to backward square leg. This time they chance a single, and get an extra run via an overthrow
Benn to Smith, no run drifts in on the leg stump, Smith hangs back, searching for a flick and gets a leading edge towards the covers
Benn to Smith, FOUR runs dragged down short on middle, Smith skips back and nails a pull to the midwicket boundary
Benn to Smith, 1 run shorter and turns outside off, square-cut away
Benn to Bailey, no run arm-ball, snakes in on off, blocked back to the bowler
Benn to Bailey, no run flighted, grips and turns outside off, prodded towards the covers
Benn to Bailey, no run Bailey uses his feet, does not quite get close to the pitch, and plays a checked drive to mid-off
Narine to Smith, 1 run straighter one from Narine, patted down to long-on
Narine to Bailey, 1 run shorter knuckle ball, cut to deep point
Narine to Smith, no run Smith presses forward to smother any spin
Narine to Smith, no run floated on off, forward and defended to the leg side
Narine to Smith, no run offbreak, Smith glances to backward square leg
Narine to Smith, 1 run full and at off, driven smoothly to long-on for one more
Benn to Smith, no run flat and turns away outside off, pushed to point
Benn to Smith, 1 run Benn is not getting his lengths right, shorter and outside off, square-cut away, again
Benn to Bailey, no run better... fuller on off, defended
Benn to Bailey, no run slider on off stump, chopped to the covers, risky picking from the stumps
Benn to Bailey, 1 run Bailey takes a trip down the pitch and milks this full one down to long-on
Benn to Smith, no run quicker one, 96ks, on off, defended back to Benn
Narine to Bailey, 1 run dropped short and outside off, camps back and punches a single to long-on
Narine to Smith, no run slower through the air on off, just 79ks, played back
Narine to Smith, 1 wide breaking down leg, wide
Narine to Smith, 1 run Smith hangs back and punches this flat one from the middle-stump line to long-on
Narine to Bailey, 1 run whipped to the right of KP at short midwicket
Narine to Smith, 1 run pushed very full on off, driven to long-on
Narine to Bailey, no run tossed on off, Bailey gets forward and across to smother it
Benn to Smith, no run drifts in full on off, poked out to cover
Benn to Smith, FOUR runs and Benn goes flat and quick outside off, Smith dabs a cut, stepping back after having ventured forward. Played late past Holder at lone slip
Benn to Smith, no run Benn opens Smith up! Drifts in and rips away past the outside edge. Top ball
Benn to Smith, 1 run very full on off, driven to long-off
Benn to Bailey, 1 run flattish on off, whipped down to long-on
Benn to Smith, no run dropped short and outside off, steps back and cuts to square point - Bravo
Narine to Bailey, no run drifting down leg, paddled straight to short fine leg
Narine to Bailey, no run flighted full on off, Bailey gets a big stride forward and defends
Narine to Bailey, no run quicker offbreak, on the back foot, punching to short midwicket
Narine to Bailey, no run full and straight, dabbed defensively to short midwicket
Narine to Bailey, no run full offbreak on middle, nudged to short midwicket
Narine to Bailey, 1 run whipped off the hips past square leg
Benn to Bailey, 1 run tossed on middle, driven to long-off
Benn to Smith, 1 run full on middle, shuffles across and whips down to long-on

Benn to Bailey, OUT soft, soft dismissal! Bailey falls, three balls after the drinks break. Length ball, drifts in on off, grips in the surface, and turns away. Bailey is left searching for a leg-side flick. Instead, he plops a leading edge into the lap of KP at short extra cover
Benn to Marsh, no run fullish on off, defended to short extra cover on the front foot
Benn to Marsh, no run pushed quicker on off, blocked off the front foot again
Benn to Marsh, no run blockhole ball at off, jammed back to Benn
Narine to Smith, no run might have been a knuckle ball outside off, passes the outside edge
Narine to Smith, 1 run shortish on off, punched to long-on
Narine to Marsh, 1 run too short outside off, forced to long-on
Narine to Smith, no run pretty full and beats the flick. Hits the pad but this floater was heading down loeg
Narine to Smith, 1 run leg-stump ball, picked away to square leg
Narine to Marsh, no run legbreak from Narine, stops on the batsman. Marsh pops it wide of short extra cover
Benn to Smith, no run grip and turn from middle, Smith half-pushes it to the off side
Benn to Smith, 1 run played with the spin to cover, again a hint of turn from middle
Benn to Marsh, no run shapes to cut but this one bounces a bit more than he expected, rolls to cover
Benn to Marsh, no run drifts into middle, Marsh lunges forward to smother the spin
Benn to Marsh, no run quicker one on off stump, this one holds its line, Marsh is cramped for room as he undercuts it
Benn to Marsh, no run drawn forward by the flight, squeezed to point. Top over
Pollard to Smith, 1 run slower one on middle, worked off his hip to midwicket
Pollard to Marsh, 1 wide slides one down leg, good take by Ramdin who moves swiftly to his left
Pollard to Marsh, FOUR runs gift, and put away. Onto the pads and he's tickled that into the fine leg boundary. To bowl there is a sin
Pollard to Marsh, 1 run bunted wide of point for an easy single
Pollard to Smith, 2 runs shuffles across and pulls towards deep backward square leg, the fielder was caught napping and Smith was off the blocks quickly for the second
Pollard to Smith, 1 run worked to deep square leg for an easy single
Pollard to Marsh, 1 run slower one on off stump, bunted towards point for an easy single. Sensible stuff
Benn to Marsh, 1 run driven with the spin to deep cover
Benn to Smith, no run drifting into middle, squeezed to short third man as he looks to drive
Benn to Smith, no run driven with the spin to cover, played that with a degree of caution
Benn to Smith, 1 run quicker one on off, touch fuller as well, eased to sweeper cover
Benn to Marsh, 1 run cuts away sharply from outside off, he crunches a cut to deep cover
Benn to Smith, no run steps out but Benn slows it down nicely, Smith can only lunge forward to smother the spin
Pollard to Marsh, no run turned to midwicket
Pollard to Marsh, 1 run firm push down the ground to long-off
Pollard to Smith, 1 run floats it full on off, Smith's attempted backfoot force rolls to point as they scamper through for a quick single
Pollard to Marsh, 1 run full on the pads, worked to long-on
Pollard to Smith, 1 run lands it on middle from wide of the crease, driven to long-on
Pollard to Marsh, 1 run too full on the pads, he flicks it from off stump to long-on
Brathwaite to Marsh, 1 run squeezed to third man, didn't have much room to work with
Brathwaite to Smith, no run shuffles across to work it past midwicket, but makes the late adjustment and defends
Brathwaite to Smith, no run sweetly timed, but the drive finds Benn at cover
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run pulled well, but straight to deep midwicket. Fletcher fires a direct hit at the bowler's end, but the batsmen had no intention of taking the second anyway

Brathwaite to Marsh, FOUR runs imperious! Key to playing the pull with that angle was to pick the length early, which he did. Rolled his wrists over the ball to keep it down. Raced away into the deep square leg boundary
Brathwaite to Marsh, 2 runs flicked into the gap between deep midwicket and long-on, runs starting to flow here
Pollard to Smith, no run excellent stop off his own bowling, moves to his right on the followthrough to intercept that drive
Pollard to Smith, 1 run forced off the backfoot to long-on
Pollard to Marsh, 1 run dabs it to point for an easy single
Pollard to Smith, no run not much room this time, floated full on middle from wide of the crease, tapped to midwicket
Pollard to Smith, 1 run full and straight on middle and leg, clipped to deep midwicket
Pollard to Marsh, FOUR runs welcome boundary! Have to say it was a poor ball. A half-volley on the pads, and he's worked that into the gap at deep midwicket
Brathwaite to Smith, no run floats a length ball on off stump, pushed to point
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 leg bye shuffles across to whip, but the extra bounce means the ball thuds into the thigh pad, they steal a leg-bye
Brathwaite to Marsh, no run solidly behind the line of that incoming length ball
Brathwaite to Marsh, no run straightens off a length on middle, rolls back down the pitch off a leading edge
Brathwaite to Marsh, no run back of length delivery on off stump, bunted to cover

Brathwaite to Marsh, FOUR runs another over where the last delivery has been picked for a boundary. Not a convincing drive, but runs nonetheless. Shapes to go over cover, but ends up slicing it behind point. Third man was too fine and had no chance
Narine to Smith, no run quicker one on middle and leg, ball deflects off the pad to short fine
Narine to Smith, 1 run worked with the spin to long on
Narine to Marsh, no run fires a quicker one on the stumps, Marsh is deep inside the crease as he defends
Narine to Marsh, 1 run whipped across the line to deep square leg
Narine to Smith, no run too full, doesn't get underneath it, squeezed to midwicket
Narine to Smith, 2 runs breaks back into middle, Smith makes a bit of room and plays it late and behind square to the boundary rider at point

Brathwaite to Marsh, FOUR runs induces the edge, but there's no one to pouch it. Marsh shapes to drive, only to be beaten by a delivery that holds its line, and the ball races off the thick edge into the third man boundary
Brathwaite to Marsh, 1 run misfield at cover gives them a run that wasn't on. Sloppy from Samuels, who was on the move as the ball was punched to him
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run pushed to point, hint of hesitation but he hares across to get to the non-striker's end, a direct hit from Darren Bravo and Smith would have been walking back
Brathwaite to Marsh, no run floats one full on middle from wide of the crease, bunted back to the bowler
Brathwaite to Marsh, no run solid thump in that drive on the up, straight to cover
Brathwaite to Marsh, 1 run inside-edges a drive to long-on
Narine to Marsh, 1 run worked with the spin to deep square leg
Narine to Smith, no run sharp turn back in, there's square leg in place to stop that whip
Narine to Smith, 1 run on the shorter side, crunched to deep point. Smith is disappointed that he couldn't take full toll of that, lets out a cry of anguish
Narine to Marsh, 1 run this one turns away, gently dabbed to cover for a quick single
Narine to Smith, 1 wide pushed through quicker, but loses direction. Excellent take down leg
Narine to Smith, no run gets across the stumps and works it to midwicket
Narine to Smith, no run this one's the carrom ball, Smith is solidly behind the line as he bunts it to cover
Brathwaite to Marsh, 1 run fraction short on off, Marsh camps back and pulls over midwicket
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run back of a length and angled in, Smith walks forward and glides a single towards point
Brathwaite to Marsh, 1 run short and outside off, Marsh swings hard, so hard that his bottom hand flies off the bat handle. Slashed to point. Smith is eager for the single and gets it
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run back of a length on off, shuffles across and clips behind square
Brathwaite to Marsh, 1 run offcutter on middle, waited and helped to fine leg
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run low full toss on off, squirted behind square on the off side and Steven Smith acknowledges his half-century, three on the trot this tri-series
Fletcher to Smith, no run legbreak outside off, steered to point
Fletcher to Smith, no run lobbed up on middle, dips, poked back. Offbreak?
Fletcher to Smith, 1 run dragged short and outside off, Smith muscles a pull to wide long-on
Fletcher to Marsh, 1 run short legbreak, half-tracker, pulled to deep midwicket from outside off
Fletcher to Smith, no run straighter one, pushed back to Fletcher
Fletcher to Smith, 1 run Smith shovels this short ball from outside off to long-on
Gabriel to Smith, no run back of a length and zings in from outside off, beaten past the inside edge
Gabriel to Smith, 1 run Smith walks across off to meet this back of a length ball on off. Whipped to deep midwicket
Gabriel to Marsh, no run short and just outside off, not enough room to work with, slashed to point
Gabriel to Marsh, no run yorker outside off, 149ks, the batsman is beaten for pace. Late to bring his bat down jab it
Gabriel to Marsh, no run low full toss on off, pushed to mid-off
Gabriel to Marsh, no run back of a length on off, pushed to mid-off again
Fletcher to Smith, no run floated on middle, nice and full, defended back
Fletcher to Smith, no run legbreak on off, run away to point
Fletcher to Smith, 1 run Smith steps out and manufactures a full toss. Whipped out to backward square leg
Fletcher to Marsh, 1 run drops the legbreak short and outside off, clunked to deep cover
Fletcher to Smith, 1 run down the track and clipped to wide long-on, Smith aims for the second, they eventually decide against it
Fletcher to Marsh, 1 run short and spins away outside off, cut through the covers
Gabriel to Marsh, no run short and outside off, cut away to point
Gabriel to Marsh, 1 run back of a length and outside off, carved over the covers. It does not carry to Johnson Charles at sweeper
Gabriel to Smith, no run good length on off, blocked to short extra cover
Gabriel to Smith, 1 run back of a length and around off, glided to backward point. A direct hit from Bravo could have got Marsh. He would have been out by a mile
Gabriel to Marsh, 1 run full and straight, flicked in the air, does not carry to KP at short midwicket
Gabriel to Smith, 1 run back of a length and outside off, helped to third man
Fletcher to Smith, 1 run full on middle, nudged through midwicket
Fletcher to Marsh, 2 runs drifting outside leg, clipped through square leg
Fletcher to Marsh, 1 run full on off, driven to long-off
Fletcher to Smith, 1 run Smith skips out and meets a full toss, which is drilled back at Fletcher. It drops short of him
Fletcher to Marsh, no run slides on outside off, chopped to point
Fletcher to Marsh, 1 run flat and full on middle, bunted to long-on
Benn to Marsh, no run drifts in full on middle, defended to short extra cover
Benn to Marsh, 1 run Marsh raises a fifty of his own. Tossed on off, driven through the covers
Benn to Smith, 1 run down the track and eased through the covers
Benn to Marsh, 2 runs tossed on middle, spins away a touch, Marsh miscues it over the covers
Benn to Marsh, 1 run dab-and-run single towards point as this was nice and full on middle
Benn to Smith, 1 run slides on off, patted to the covers for one
Pollard to Smith, 1 wide full cutter down leg, offbreak goes wide
Pollard to Smith, no run not too short, not too wide to cut. Smith flashes and misses the roller
Pollard to Smith, 1 wide another offcutter down leg, second wide of the over
Pollard to Smith, 1 run shortish on off, tapped down to long-on
Pollard to Marsh, 1 run lifting offcutter on middle, fended to short midwicket
Pollard to Smith, no run full on off, shuffles across and whips to short midwicket
Pollard to Smith, 2 runs back of a length and outside off, punchily driven to the left of short extra cover
Pollard to Smith, 1 run full and outside off, this cutter is wristily picked up over midwicket
Benn to Smith, no run down the track and yorks himself. Jammed out to short extra cover
Benn to Smith, 1 run dragged from outside off towards short fine leg off the inside half
Benn to Marsh, no run Benn fires a full toss at off, 101.3ks, squeezed back to the bowler
Benn to Marsh, 1 run blockhole ball on off, pushed to long-off
Benn to Smith, FOUR runs shot! Smith advances and backs away outside leg to meet this full ball. He unfurls an inside-out drive over extra cover

Benn to Smith, 1 run The sub fielder Carter nails a direct hit from short midwicket at the non-striker's end, but the Australia captain is home. Slides his bat in and makes it. He clipped this one to the leg side and rushed off
Pollard to Smith, 1 run length ball on off, driven to long-on
Pollard to Marsh, 1 run 105ks back of a length offcutter, sticks in the surface, Marsh punches it back. Pollard dives to his right in his followthrough. It does not stick
Pollard to Smith, 1 run back of a length and outside off, steered to point
Pollard to Marsh, FOUR runs back of a length and outside off, Marsh unleashes a cut, splitting backward point and short third man
Pollard to Marsh, 1 run slapped to point, diving save from Carter
Pollard to Smith, 1 run floated full and outside off, eased through point
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run slower delivery on the stumps from wide of the crease, squeezed to short third man where Narine effects a tumbling stop
Brathwaite to Marsh, 2 runs picks the length early and pulls in front of square, didn't entirely get hold of it, wide long-on runs around to cut that off

Brathwaite to Marsh, 1 leg bye stifled lbw appeal as Marsh looks to work across the line, the ball deflects off the pad to third man. There was appreciable bounce there, and so the ball would have comfortably missed the stumps
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run on the pads, worked with the angle to deep midwicket
Brathwaite to Marsh, 1 run yorker-length delivery on middle, squeezed down to long-on
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run strays down leg side, worked to deep midwicket
Benn to Smith, 1 run steps out to take it on the full and squeeze it past cover
Benn to Marsh, 2 runs smears the full toss between long-on and long-off, wasn't off the middle but he hit it hard into the ground to get it over the bowler's head
Benn to Marsh, no run hammered, but straight back to the bowler

Benn to Marsh, 1 run, OUT that's the wicket West Indies were longing for. Smith doesn't even wait to see what the third umpire has to offer. It was a full toss which Marsh whipped to wide long-on. A second didn't look on but they decided to chance their luck, and unfortunately it didn't work this
Benn to Marsh, 1 run flicks the low full toss to long-on again
Benn to Maxwell, no run beaten by square turn. This one drifts in, and then rips away from the rough to beat Maxwell comprehensively
Gabriel to Marsh, 1 run helped towards fine leg, wrong line there, he was sliding the length ball into the pads
Gabriel to Maxwell, 1 run into the blockhole, squeezed to deep backward square leg, Maxwell fell over slightly as he made contact
Gabriel to Marsh, 1 run another attempted yorker, jams his bat down in time to direct that towards long-on
Gabriel to Maxwell, no run drives, gets a thick inside edge to midwicket. The ball tailed back in slightly to beat him in that stroke
Gabriel to Maxwell, 1 run another yorker-length delivery on middle, bunted to long-on
Gabriel to Marsh, no run low full toss outside off, finds the cover fielder. Just four of the over, pressure building

Narine to Maxwell, 2 byes this one cuts back in sharply to sneak through the big gap between Maxwell's bat and pad as he shapes to cut. He thought the ball would spin the other way. It beat the keeper too, as it trickled towards fine leg
Narine to Maxwell, 1 wide quicker one on middle and leg, but it was sliding down leg, Ramdin collects cleanly. Wide called
Narine to Maxwell, no run plays a premeditated reverse sweep, but finds short third man. Not in control, you have to say
Narine to Maxwell, 1 run not there to cut, but he somehow manages to squeeze that full delivery past cover for a single
Narine to Marsh, no run flatter one that breaks back into middle and leg, Marsh is struck on the pad as he looks to nurdle it past square leg
Narine to Marsh, no run this one's a cleverly-disguised leg-cutter, which Marsh defends
Narine to Marsh, 1 run flat-bats a pull to long-on, excellent over again from Narine
Gabriel to Marsh, 1 bye pulls and misses, Ramdin half-stops it but ensures the pace is taken off the ball, Ashley Nurse, filling in for Holder, stops that at short fine leg

Gabriel to Maxwell, FOUR runs backs away and smacks that over cover, one bounce into the boundary. This was too full, and he made sure he got underneath the length to pick the boundary. Mid-off was up, and that perhaps gave him the confidence to play that stroke
Gabriel to Maxwell, no run excellent comeback, yorker-length ball a 145 clicks, Maxwell was through with the swing even before the ball got to him
Gabriel to Maxwell, no run sees the batsman trying to make room and bowls it full and wide, Maxwell can't reach out. The ball was well inside the wide line. Smart bowling

Gabriel to Maxwell, FOUR runs solid connection, one bounce into the long-off boundary. Those strong forearms to the fore! Gabriel looks for the blockhole but misses his length by an inch, if not more, and it's enough for the batsman to get underneath the length.
Gabriel to Maxwell, 2 runs through the inner ring, squeezed between cover and point, they're back for the second
Narine to Marsh, 1 run leg-cutter on off stump, worked across the line to long-on
Narine to Maxwell, 1 run walks across to sweep, but the ball fizzed off the surface to beat his swing and deflect off the thigh pad to short fine leg
Narine to Marsh, 1 run he's clobbered that, but straight to deep midwicket

Narine to Maxwell, SIX runs is that the six that changes his fortunes? Maxwell at his destructive best. This time he brings out the switch hit and slaps it over deep point. Off the middle of the bat. That's the first boundary Narine has conceded today
Narine to Maxwell, 1 run worked behind square on the leg side for an easy single
Narine to Marsh, 1 run short outside off, crunched to deep point
Brathwaite to Marsh, 1 run thick inside edge to long-on, wanted to go straight, but ends up dragging it
Brathwaite to Maxwell, 1 run slower one on middle, nudged to short fine leg
Brathwaite to Marsh, 1 run eased between cover and point, sensible stuff

Brathwaite to Maxwell, FOUR runs misfield by Samuels at cover, and it has cost them a boundary. Drills a yorker-length delivery, Samuels lets it though his legs. Elementary stuff. Got up a little too early

Brathwaite to Maxwell, SIX runs this time he brings out the cross-batted swipe over deep midwicket. This was too full and he picked the bones out of that one. Darren Bravo leaps high to stop that, but can only get his finger tips to that. At no stage was he in control

Brathwaite to Maxwell, FOUR runs this time the back-blade hit from Maxwell, or is it? Too short and angling in, he changes the grip helps that past short third man. Is he back? I dare say yes. Surely this over has all but sealed it for Australia.
Narine to Marsh, 1 run bunted down to long-on for an easy single
Narine to Maxwell, 2 runs walks across the stumps and whips it into the gap at wide long-on, called for two immediately
Narine to Maxwell, FOUR runs fired into the pads, and Maxwell has swept that into the fine leg boundary. Quickly gets down on one knee and uses the pace to help it into the boundary
Narine to Maxwell, 1 run swipes that across the line, to deep midwicket
Narine to Marsh, 1 run punched to deep point, sensible stuff from Mitch Marsh
Narine to Maxwell, 1 run gets to the pitch of the ball and nurdles it to backward square leg
Pollard to Maxwell, 1 run chips one over midwicket for a single
Pollard to Marsh, 1 run driven through the line to Carter at mid-off, scores level, another opportunity for Maxwell to get a fifty
Pollard to Maxwell, no run looks to whip it away but ends up playing it back to the bowler
Pollard to Maxwell, 1 run game, set and match - Australia . On the pads, and he's worked that towards deep midwicket to complete the win
That is all we have for you. Thanks for tuning in. Goodbye and cheers. Ciao on Friday.

8.30pm Australia are through to the final, while West Indies v South Africa on Thursday will be a do-or-die clash. This clash was right in the balance when Australia lost their openers, but the Smith-Marsh stand set things up nicely for Glenn Maxwell to redeem himself in some style. All of that reduced a
Australia won by 6 wickets (with 8 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Marlon Samuels, WI
